title: Multiple Return Values
description: In this lab, you will learn how to use multiple return values in Go functions, including how to return two input parameters in reverse order and how to accept a variable number of arguments in Go functions.

meta.title: Multiple Return Values
meta.description: Discover the power of multiple return values in Go programming, a feature that enables you to return both a result and an error value from a function.
meta.keywords: go playground, error handling, go programming, go, multiple return values, go labs, go playground online, function return, go tutorial, go lab

verify.name: Verify Go Multiple Return Values
verify.hint: Please make sure you have completed the required actions.
